casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Michael D. MILLER, Defendant-Respondent. C-913 September Term 2017
079342 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 15, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000459-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the appellant may serve and file a supplemental brief on or before August 13, 2018, and respondent may serve and file a supplemental brief forty-five (45) days after the filing of appellant's supplemental submission, or, if appellant declines to file such a submission, on or before September 27, 2018.
